awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 nomination.

fullplot: A short Arizona motorcycle cop gets his wish and is promoted to Homicide following the mysterious murder of a hermit. He is forced to confront his illusions about himself and those around him in order to solve the case, eventually returning to solitude in the desert.

title: Electra Glide in Blue
